actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to adjust the acreage reduction program for oats.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from requiring a producer of oats to reduce oat acreage to less than 95 percent of the feed grain crop acreage base allocated to oats and barley with respect to the 1988 through 1990 crops. Directs the Secretary to announce revisions of the acreage limitation program for the 1988 feed grain crop to reflect this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to adjust the acreage reduction program for oats.
